file_content.text: I could hear the bomb blasts from here. Glad those weren't our facilities.
The rebels' facilities have been destroyed.
I heard the fireworks from here, my lord.
Some fireworks. You're fast, and you're good.
Nothing like the smell of rebels roasting on their own blasted suitcase bombs.
Blast these vermin back into the Stone Age.
Don't sneak up on me like that!
I'm sorry. I've been on surveillance for four days; my reflexes are getting a little--
My lord! I apologize. I've been on surveillance for four days straight, and I--
Sorry. I just... I've been on surveillance here for four days straight. My reflexes aren't what they--
I'm following up on a known rebel base location.
If you have a location, why hasn't a strike been mobilized?
Where?
We did--captured some of their low-level operatives, but no one at the top.
Can I help?
That would be a dream come true. Oh, I shouldn't have mentioned "dreams...."
My lord, that would be a dream come true. Not that I'm dreaming on the job!
If you want to help, I won't stop you.
One of the captured rebels admitted his team was scavenging unexploded thermal detonators from battlefields.
You should get thirty lashes for sleeping on the job.
You're a disgrace!
I've been awake round-the-clock working on a confession we got from a captured rebel.
The rebels have a whole operation just scavenging unexploded thermal detonators from battlefields.
They're using the thermite to build their own improvised bombs.
These rebels cannot get away with mocking the Empire.
We must stop them.
Precisely my thought, my lord.
We don't want that kind of strategy to spread.
I'll go after them.
Thank you!
For the right price, I'll cram that thermite down their throats.
You want my help?
Sold!
How are we handling this?
Does that mean you want to help?
If you're in, I think we should feed these scum their own medicine--steal their bombs and use them on them.
I'll transmit the specs--where to get the bombs, and the best places to blow to bloody bits once you have them.
If you pull it off, let me know--my superiors will want the gory details.
I'm not getting myself blown up while you sit back here and snooze.
Forget it. [Refuse quest]
It's not like that--nevermind. You do what you have to.
I'm awake! I'm awake!
